fullText: The show works best when it focuses on the complex relationship between these two women who were both pioneers and competitors in the cosmetics industry.
dtliExcerpt: The show works best when it focuses on the complex relationship between these two women who were both pioneers and competitors in the cosmetics industry.
bwwExcerpt: But while there is enough substance in 'War Paint' to make you feel like everyone involved here is fully aware of the complexity of what these characters represented, the show ultimately demurs when it comes to holding the great titans of makeup, and the men who surrounded them, to moral account. And that is what might just have made 'War Paint' a truly great musical, instead of a highly entertaining and provocative one.
showScoreExcerpt: The show works best when it focuses on the complex relationship between these two women who were both pioneers and competitors in the cosmetics industry.
